label: Weapon_Bow_071_PictureBook
text: Princess Zelda gave you this bow and arrow for the battle with Dark Beast Ganon. When wielded by the hero, it fires arrows of pure light strong enough to oppose the Calamity.

label: Weapon_Bow_003_Name
text: Spiked Boko Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_017_Name
text: Falcon Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_017_Desc
text: A highly refined Rito-made bow created by a master Rito craftsman. Rito warriors favor it for its superior rate of fire, which helps them excel even further at aerial combat.

label: Weapon_Bow_030_Desc
text: This bow is wielded by Lizalfos who are expert marksmen. The metal that reinforces much of the weapon adds some additional weight but offers heightened durability.

label: Weapon_Bow_035_PictureBook
text: The sturdy metal construction of this bow offers superior durability, while its lack of firing quirks makes it quite reliable. Once favored by the knights at Hyrule Castle.

label: Weapon_Bow_015_PictureBook
text: This Gerudo-made bow is popular for the fine ornamentations along its limbs. Designed for hunting and warfare alike, this bow was engineered to strike distant targets.

label: Weapon_Bow_026_Desc
text: This massive Lynel bow sports a bowstring made from a metal so tough, mere Hylians have trouble drawing it back.

label: Weapon_Bow_004_Desc
text: A basic Bokoblin bow made of wood. It's made by taking any tree branch and just tying a string to either end, so don't expect much in the way of combat effectiveness.

label: Weapon_Bow_030_PictureBook
text: This bow is wielded by Lizalfos who are expert marksmen. The metal that reinforces much of the weapon adds some additional weight but offers heightened durability.

label: Weapon_Bow_040_PictureBook
text: A bow favored by the skilled archers of the Yiga Clan. It's been engineered to fire two arrows at once to ensure your target comes to a swift and none-too-pleasant halt.

label: Weapon_Bow_035_Desc
text: The sturdy metal construction of this bow offers superior durability, while its lack of firing quirks makes it quite reliable. Once favored by the knights at Hyrule Castle.

label: Weapon_Bow_030_Name
text: Steel Lizal Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_013_Desc
text: The Koroks made this bow for Hylians. It's crafted from flexible wood and uses sturdy vines for the bowstring. Its construction may be simple, but it fires multiple arrows at once.

label: Weapon_Bow_009_Name
text: Lynel Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_026_Name
text: Mighty Lynel Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_004_Name
text: Boko Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_009_Desc
text: A Lynel-made bow crafted from rough metal. True to the vicious nature of Lynel weaponry, it fires a spread of multiple arrows at once. Ideal for taking down quick-moving targets.

label: Weapon_Bow_035_Name
text: Knight's Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_009_PictureBook
text: A Lynel-made bow crafted from rough metal. True to the vicious nature of Lynel weaponry, it fires a spread of multiple arrows at once. Ideal for taking down quick-moving targets.

label: Weapon_Bow_013_Name
text: Forest Dweller's Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_014_PictureBook
text: A bow favored by the Zora for fishing. It doesn't boast the highest firepower, but the special metal it's crafted from prioritizes durability.

label: Weapon_Bow_004_PictureBook
text: A basic Bokoblin bow made of wood. It's made by taking any tree branch and just tying a string to either end, so don't expect much in the way of combat effectiveness.

label: Weapon_Bow_027_Desc
text: A Boko bow reinforced by fossils. Bokoblins handpicked the materials it's made from, so it boasts a respectable firepower.

label: Weapon_Bow_029_PictureBook
text: A bow passed down through the Sheikah tribe. Concentrating before drawing the string will allow you to target distant enemies as easily as those nearby.

label: Weapon_Bow_071_Desc
text: Princess Zelda gave you this bow and arrow for the battle with Dark Beast Ganon. When wielded by the hero, it fires arrows of pure light strong enough to oppose the Calamity.

label: Weapon_Bow_036_Desc
text: In the past, the king of Hyrule presented this bow to only the most talented archers in the land. Its combat capabilities are as impressive as its extravagant design.

label: Weapon_Bow_014_Desc
text: A bow favored by the Zora for fishing. It doesn't boast the highest firepower, but the special metal it's crafted from prioritizes durability.

label: Weapon_Bow_027_Name
text: Dragon Bone Boko Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_003_PictureBook
text: An upgraded Boko bow bound with animal bone to boost its durability and firepower. Its craftsmanship is sloppy, but it's light and easy to use.

label: Weapon_Bow_040_Name
text: Duplex Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_071_Name
text: Bow of Light

label: Weapon_Bow_036_Name
text: Royal Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_040_Desc
text: A bow favored by the skilled archers of the Yiga Clan. It's been engineered to fire two arrows at once to ensure your target comes to a swift and none-too-pleasant halt.

label: Weapon_Bow_014_Name
text: Silver Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_028_PictureBook
text: A bow without equal wielded by the Rito Champion, Revali. It's said Revali could loose arrows with the speed of a gale, making him supreme in aerial combat.

label: Weapon_Bow_013_PictureBook
text: The Koroks made this bow for Hylians. It's crafted from flexible wood and uses sturdy vines for the bowstring. Its construction may be simple, but it fires multiple arrows at once.

label: Weapon_Bow_028_Desc
text: A bow without equal wielded by the Rito Champion, Revali. It's said Revali could loose arrows with the speed of a gale, making him supreme in aerial combat.

label: Weapon_Bow_023_Name
text: Ancient Bow

label: Weapon_Bow_023_PictureBook
text: This bow is the result of Robbie's research. Ancient Sheikah technology affords it heightened functionality. Arrows fired from it travel in a perfectly straight line.

label: Weapon_Bow_033_PictureBook
text: This prototype Sheikah-made bow was designed to fight the Great Calamity. Made with ancient technology, it boasts a high rate of fire and firepower but has low durability.
